content.text:
# Draft:Traditional music of Galicia

.]]
The traditional music of Galicia is characterized by its forms (such as muiñeiras, xotas, maneos, alalás, and aturuxos), instruments (gaita galega, pandeireta, and cunchas'', among others), and musical groups. As traditional music that has evolved orally, it shares common traits with the neighboring areas of Asturias, Portugal, and León, and in general with the musical tradition of Atlantic Europe.
